chapter.title: Other ways to connect to the OpenEngSB
chapter.para: The OpenEngSB internal is completely written in the Java programming language. Nevertheless it could be accessed by other programming languages with the help of JMS. Apache ActiveMQ does provide interfaces for many different programming languages as CSharp, Ruby, Perl, Python, PHP, C++. This section describes how to connect to the OpenEngSB from these languages.

section.title: Prerequisite
section.para: It is required that the OpenEngSB is up and running as explained in the quickstart session in the essential part.

section.title: Connect with CSharp
section.para: The CSharp connector is written on basis of the Apache ActiveMQ NMS connector and with help of the Spring NmsTemplate. The code is checked into the repository and could be found in openengsb/openengsb-nonjava/csharp. There an EngSB.sln file. This project file had been developed with SharpDevelop3, but is also tested with VisualStudio2008 CSharp Express Edition with the .net framework 3.5.
